description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a UI component named 'NoteEditor' using LightningJS framework. It manages note editing functionalities including title, body, autosave, and delete actions within a note-taking application.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, including title, body, delete functionality, and autosave behavior.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Asynchronously updates the note data via dataProvider.refresh and handles errors by showing a toast message.

methods.name: _setTitle
methods.description: Updates the title text of the note and optionally triggers a save operation.

methods.name: _setBody
methods.description: Updates the body text of the note and optionally triggers a save operation.
